name: Experlogix
tagline: Quote It Fast. Sell It Right.
description: Headquartered in the beautiful Silicon Slopes of the Salt Lake Valley, Experlogix is a premier provider of CPQ (Configure, Price, Quote) technology, specializing in fully integrated quote and order automation solutions for Microsoft Dynamics, Salesforce and NetSuite. Experlogix delivers the scalability and flexibility needed to handle virtually any CPQ requirement at a low total cost of ownership.
